knimeNode.name: Fingerprint From Binary String
knimeNode.shortDescription: Convert to a fingerprint column to a Binary String representation

intro.p: This node converts to a fingerprint column from a Binary String representation
This node was developed by Vernalis (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: The column containing the Binary string fingerprint
If true, the input fingerprint column is kept
The fingerprint type for the output

ports.inPort: Input table containing a Binary fingerprint string column
